ai-patthana18.3:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, third in the place he had allowed to,
ai-patthana18.3:0.3_0: Transmigration for the sake of quarrels, etc.
ai-patthana18.3:1.1_0: because of cause or reason, without cause or reason, without cause or reason,
ai-patthana18.3:2.1_0: It is not because of cause or reason, nor because of reason,
ai-patthana18.3:3.1_0: because of the cause, for the sake of the reason, not with the sake of these reasons.
ai-patthana18.3:4.1_0: (They are) not associated with cause or reasons. (They are) not rooted in this way.
ai-patthana18.3:5.1_0: You don’t give rise to cause or reason for sake of a reason or cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.3:6.1_0: or because of reasoning or cause,
